GoalDesc: Reduce inequality within and among countries
TargetDesc: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
IndicatorDesc: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
SeriesDesc: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries (millions of current United States dollars)

Source: DAC Statistics database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)

TargetDesc: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
IndicatorDesc: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
